content.detailedDescription: While leaving work, i saw between 8 and 10 reddish-orange lights in tandem, traveling from the nw turning towards the se towards mt rainier. observed this with at least two other witnesses for a duration of approximately 2 minutes. the lights all blinked as a star would, but then went behind cloud cover, and disappeared. called the faa, and they had no reports of anything.
content.summary: Numerous lights in tandem formation

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with the dogs listening to my neighbors argue. my girlfriend was getting out of her car,when i looked over my right shoulder and saw what i thought was an ember floating about 50 feet away from me. then i realized it was farther away from me and not a piece of floating paper bag or something. i started yelling at my girl to run over and look at it. she saw it also. at first it looked like it was floating then it moved in a straight line, stopped for a half second and proceed to move away from us going east towards bethlehem. it looked like fire on top, but no distinct flames. when it moved away from us, i could vaguely see 3 prongs..Appendages ...Whatever's coming out from the bottom . it got farther away and went behind a tree that's about 80 feet tall. i can't say exactly how far away it was or how big.  i didn't have shoes on, otherwise i would have ran down my alley to see it maybe a little longer. i ran inside my house to get my shoes. when i came out, my girlfriend had already walked out front of the house to see if she could see it still. it was gone by then. i never believed in ufos. i don't have any explanation for what i saw tonight.  i also posted it on facebook hoping someone else had seen it.  i'm just glad my girlfriend saw it too.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A paper bag on fire.

content.detailedDescription: What looked like  star went across the sky and dimmed out as it left my vision, i couldnt stop lookin at it.
content.summary: Star like object the same size as venus. or is pluto?

content.detailedDescription:
It was dark at 3 am.I slept in my house on st. martin with a panoramic view of the sea.
i was awaken by a gong-like sound ,metallic resonance.It was a big copper plate hanging on the cement wall put in motion by something.The copper  plate was bouncing of the wall and making laud  sound.
when i got up and looked through the french door towards the sea i saw a bright glowing orange oval 100feet wide sitting on small uninhabited island(pinel)just offshore of st.Martin.  
i did not know what it was, but i was curious .So, i was staring at it trying to figure out what it was. i was mesmerized.
i did not believed in ufo`s then.
finally i realized that this has to be ufo & i panicked .I got very scared.
i ran to the other end of a big house to talk to someone.When i looked through the window of the other room, the oval was gone,but above the island was unusual low hanging white cloud with light shining from underneath of it.
there was no other clouds in the sky.It was a clear caribbean night.  
when i told about it to some friends there, they said several of their friends saw ufos on st. martin/st.Maarten.
i made a drawing of the object and the following night i had a dream about the object and its "structure" & i made a drawing of it also.
content.summary: I saw a stationary ufo, glowing , orange oval at night on st. martin 1995

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road in ft. indiantown gap, pa on my way to my grandparents house in pine grove, pa and out of the corner of my eye i caught the lights in the sky flashing from red to white. at first, i thought that they had put up radio or cell towers but then the lights started to move. they started off slowly and they shot off one by one to the right and then came back to the left. they got closer and then retreated. they would disappear and reappear. by this time, i had stopped my car on the back road that i was traveling on and got my camera out that i carry with me all the time to take pictures of my 3 year old and family. i got a few pictures and took a video of the lights that i saw. the whole ordeal lasted about 20 minutes total before the lights disappeared for the last time. this was my 2nd sighting of strange lights in the sky. the first sighting i was a young teenager and the lights that i saw then were comet like and bright and flew in a circular pattern almost like it was spinning and then would fly in a line. these lights had a tail like a comet though. not like the lights that i saw tonight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 lights flying in strange formation

content.detailedDescription: Came home between nine and ten pm. drove into property and left car to lock front gate. gate faces the mountains looking east.It is very dark here about mag. 7-7.5 skies. also you can hear the bubbles in a soda can from about 3 feet away, that is how quiet it is here! i heard nothing at all but my side vision picked up light bright enough for me to look to my side (south/east) i saw a series of lights start to cycle on and off they seemed to be yellow/orange in color and cycled rather fast. they were high enough in the sky to look higher then the distant mountains!I could not tell how far away or how high they actualy were. these were closer to the east. then a second after they stoped a series of other lights farther to the west did the same thing. there seemed to be some distance between them or like a very big gap. after they stoped the lights to their east started flashing again. then once more the other set of lights cycled on and off again. they did this i believe about three times. each of the lights in both groups looked to have a good space between each other. the all seemed to be at about the same level in the sky and i would guess by the distance between the two groups that they were seperated by at least mayby a half mile. hard to really say as all i could see was the lights flashing and watched for about 10 min. after they stoped and could not see any object/objects in the sky and heard no sound at all. it's very dark here and also very quiet. you can hear a car coming down the road at least a mile away! very few house lights.I came outside a bit later after going into the house to let out the dogs and watched for a while. never saw them again. i know the area (sky, mountains, etc) very well in the daytime and there is nothing but empty space and sky in the direction that i observed the lights. not to sound like a nut, but it was very simular almost to the scene in close encounters! thank's.
content.summary: Locking my gate and saw lights in sky start to turn on and of towards s/e they stoped. then other lights started doing same more to the west of others. did that a few cycles and stoped.As if signaling?No noise at all. lights varied in strength.Very dark .

content.detailedDescription:
Dull red,orange light appeared above thedistant mountains, moving from the wnw in a straight line until almost overhead,thenmade a90 degree turn to the wsw and fell below the mountains.

my wife saw the object but only after it madethe turn. (icalled her to see the iss!)

the object was seen by one other person who did not see it until ithad turned.
content.summary: above

content.detailedDescription: I have a picture of my aunts house, along the side of the house is the outline of a being that is about 4ft tall with long black eyes and is very thin. he looks clear, almost like you would be able to see through him. he has very long thin arms and what looks like bony black hands. you can see him better when the picture is blown up bigger, because it seems he is trying to keep from being seen by standing flush against the side of the house. i have had this picture looked @ by many people and they all say they can see the outline of a "little creature" but that "it's not an alien" i would like you to see the picture and tell me what you think. i truly believe i have a picture of an alien, and if so! it would be the only one, and the first real proof they are real. i have even taken the picture to nasa in cleveland, ohio and they looked @ the picture, put me into a small room and told me to wait. after about a half hour, two men came in and told me i needed to give them my picture,they said they would take a better look @ it and then give me a call back. when i did not want to give them my picture, they wanted me to go with them into another room, i told them i needed to "use the lady's room" and i left! they did not seem very happy with the fact that i would not give them my picture, and they creeped me out. i think my picture is worth taking a look @ and i hope you also think so. please let me know if you would like to send a field rep out to have a look. thanks much.
content.summary: I have a picture of an entity standing against a house that seems to be an ailen hiding

content.detailedDescription: We (my daughter, two friends and myself) saw in the horizon (north) something glittering. the sky was very clear, no clouds at all. the glittering effect kept on for some time, enough to make us interested to start observing the sight. gradually a group of spherical objects was clearly approaching moving south-southeast at an apparently high speed, in a parabolic line , giving the impression that they occassionally hovered. the observation was very clear and kept for at least 20 mins. for some moments they were close enough to be counted (by all four of us) to be 12. they followed a very smouth pattern and moved at an almost unchanged formation. people passing by got also interested and at a point there must have been at least 20-25 people stirring at the sky watching the objects. they were not a bunch of mettalic helium baloons got loose, nevertheless one could have mistaken them for such had they not been travelling so fast and being so large. actual size of objects cannot be estimated, but they were clearly viewed to be spherical and mettalic, 12 in number and travelling at an altitude of apro 500-1000feet. in the twenty minuted that they were being viewed they must have travelled a distance of at least 200-250 miles, as they appeared on north side of the horizon and faded away towards the south-southeast having passed directly above us. the observation spot was an elevated hill close to the sea so the perimetrical horizon was extended.Thanks!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Approx 12-15 spherical objects moving fast and occassionally hovering in an almost steady formation . metallic at prety high altitude(500-1000 ft) for aprx 20 mins. then faded away.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and four of my close friends were hanging outside in the driveway around 10pm in merritt island, fl. my boyfriend then shouted "ufo!" not taking him seriously we all laughed but quickly looked in the direction he was pointing. to everyones amazement there was a light moving across the sky. we waited for the blinking lights to prove it was a plane or helicopter. no blinking lights ever came. it was the same steady solid white light. the object still slowing moved in the same direction, east. we knew for how far in the sky the object was it was moving faster than any plane we have ever seen. so we then start to say "it must be a satellite or slow shooting star. as we all have seen both before. the moving object then quickly changed direction jumping across the sky. then went back in same direction and disappered. at that point there is no way it was a satellite or shooting star. it changed direction. stars, planes, helicopters, and satellites do not act in this way. like i said this was witnessed by myself and four other adults. i felt strongly enough to report this. i should also say we live only minutes away from nasa and pafb. what we saw was almost directly over the area of nasa.
content.summary: Was standing outside with four other people. saw what looked like a star moving acorss the sky. all five of us witnessed this moving across the sky. it then changed direction twice and then disappered.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter (14) was watching television when she heard a noise possibly out back of the house. she opened the back door and saw a very large ufo hovering in the sky. she told me the next day that it was in the direction of the us navy base johnsville naval air station. this is where the astrnauts trained for space missions. i call ed the officer of theday at johnsville and he confirmed that there was an event the night before. i called the northampton township police dept. and they confirmed an event that prompted approx 500 calls of a sighting. i called the local newspapers and they would not comment on this. i know that this is a long time ago, but these facts are documented.
content.summary: A documented sighting of a very large ufo at a naval air station

content.detailedDescription: This event is not the one i would have prefered to report but this report page does not give much leeway for much else as it is suited for one particular sighting and i wanted to report multiple sightings on almost a daily/nightly basis for the last year or two. my area where i live is a virtual hotbed for ufo sightings, we sit on lawnchairs on our front lawn at night and observe the sky and always they show up, sometimes they sit still and flash a light so bright it blinds us, this i believe is to make sure we notice as before the brightness they appear as a red light, almost looking like a distant star. after this show of light they begin to move in an upward fashion as we can clealy see them heading out of earths atmosphere and entering into space, at this time they begin looking like a satellite crossing the sky. this sort of behaviour is common, we witness it everytime we have an inkling to go out and sky watch the colours we see most are red, blue, green and white brightness, 2 nights ago we saw an orange one following a plane, this morning was the first we have seen in daylight hours which is the one i reported in the form here. most of the sightings are in the eastern sky but, they do appear in all other parts of the sky, we observe with telescope, binoculars, our naked eye and we have captured film footage of one ufo, unfortunately my friend had the camera and took the footage, they are in denial of what they witnessed but told me they will keep the footage for me so i may see it myself, when we viewed it at time of filming it looked good, when they got home with it and watched on thier tv they said it is too blurred and cant tell what it is but, its very bright and is moving. i have witnessed a dimensional door open in thin air above my roof on night, at first it was not there, it was around 10pm and i was only steps away from my front door when a bright light in the sky caught my eye, it was very bright, as quickly as i noticed it dimmed to a bright red light and then proceeded to move slowly vertically across the sky, aproximate hieght i would guess would be 1000 feet up mayb less, as it moved slowly across the redness of the light began to dim. i followed it with my eyes, i was transfixed on it, after roughly 30 to 45 seconds i noticed movement to the left, i looked, it was in view of the ufo, i could see both things in my range of vision, i was not staring at the ufo directly now, this other object that appeared was not moving, it was not an object at all. this is right out of a science fiction novel but i swear its the truth, the sky peeled back, like a blanket being pulled back as you climb into bed, stars disappeared from the night sky where this opening in thin air now appeared, like a door opening, i looked at the ufo, it was getting dimmer and dimmer and then it passed into this black hole left from this phenomena, this hole or doorway in the sky, as it disappeared from sight the sky folded back into place and the stars in that particular area of the sky reappeared. this is my most exotic sighting ever, i am in my 50's and i have been seeing ufo's for 36 years, this is my first report, it's too bad i cannot express myself better here the way i can if i told you personally, having witnessed this i firmly believe these are interdimensional beings and not extraterestrial, i witnessed a dimensional door opening above my house in thin air and this craft passed into it, i can go on and on, i have many stories of sightings but this much is good enough for now. as i said earlier, there are sightings on a nightly basis here and all you have to do is look up and be open about what you are seeing, peace out
content.summary: This was just a bright whiteish in appearance, an orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work (second shift off at 11 ish) and with few cars on the road i happened to look up out of the windshield of my auto and saw what looked like a commercial aircraft zoo close to the ground i thought it was gonna crash.  i stopped my car when i realized that it was simply hovering in place then pulled into the parking / play lot of the grade school, turned off my engine and got out to look up at it.  i was a grey cigar shaped craft and i was struck that it didn't have wings and it occurred to me that it was not possible for something so large and no sound to just hang there over head.  i stood under it looking up for a few minutes and it slowly began moving in a lazy movement and turned on a dime a one point.  i was not fearful but amazed at this.  it moved less than 1 mph away from me and i watched it till it went past the roof tops of the neighborhood houses.  i got back in my car and drove home.

this happened in cincinnati, ohio in front of a catholic grade school, st. aloysius gonzaga on the west side of cincinnati. 4390 bridgetown road, 45211


this is not the only unexplained object i have see and will be happy to share all as long as it is taken serious.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Cigar shape, no wings with conical tail gear.  size of commercial air-liner.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1030pm in i was getting off wrk @ umc i just looked in the sky n saw 1 flashing light then 2 ,3,4,5,6, n so on it was about 20 flashing flying lik up n down i call my co worker cuz i knew dey were headed out on da other side n it was three of them in they looked in the sky n saw it to it was so freaky cuz i seen sum lik dat n real life .......
content.summary: It was about 20 red flashing lights in da dark sky !!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the back yard at a table when i noticed the table top light up like the moon had suddenly gotten very bright.  i looked up & it was directly over head flying very low.  there were clouds in the sky & it was flying below the clouds.  it looked like a ball of light about the size of a softball, that was shimmering with light.  the light was yellowish orange to begin with but as it flew past very slowly, the light changed to red & then back to yellowish orange & off white.  
i grabbed my cell phone & took a video but i was so excited i couldn't get to the camcorder part of my phone quick enough & by the time i got the video started the ufo had moved on past me a bit.  being that i don't have a very high tech phone, the video is not the greatest but you can see what i saw on it.  you can see it better by viewing it full screen.  
i have never seen anything like this before & have no reference for it was other than it had to have been a ufo!
i read on your website that someone from the ou campus had seen this on the same night.  that is interesting because i am straight north & a little bit west of ou about 15 miles.  i'm sure they saw what i saw because it was coming to me from that direction & kept traveling north west.  what they described was pretty much the same thing that i saw.
in the video it looks like it was bobbing around but it was not.  the bobbing is from me trying to keep it on the thing as it left the area.  i was too excited & a bit freaked out by it.
content.summary: Ball of bright shimmering light flew slowly over head very low to ground from se to nw.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving southbound on 360 near six flags, i had noticed a few planes in the sky already. what looked like a very large and bright star appeared within my view while looking down the road and i watched it shoot downwards, coming from the upper atmosphere it seemed like. there was no trail behind it, despite it's considerable size and if it was farther than it appeared than it could be even larger. i could immediately tell it was no airplane, and thought i might be seeing a shooting star or meteor. 
the object did not break up at all or appear to get smaller, only moving in a downwards direction before disappearing completely well before it even got close to the horizon or any other obstacle that could have blocked my vision. my girlfriend sitting in the passenger seat exclaimed before i did, and we both confirmed we saw the same thing. it appeared as a solid white oval against the night sky and did not fade or shimmer out, just disappearing completely.
content.summary: Appeared to be a large and bright star or meteor falling downwards at extremely high speed, disappeared long before reached horizon

content.detailedDescription: I live between dublin and worthington just north of the outerbelt in columbus. i was smoking on my porch and i saw this thing going by my house about 300-400 feet away. i saw it going through trees and over houses, it looked like it was about 50 feet up. i thought it was a plane at first because of the lights (red on side towards me  blue on the other and white lights on fore and aft). the lights struck me as very odd... they flashed like airplane lights but very slowly. they faded in and out at the same one second intervals (red and blue. the white lights stayed consistently on). it moved pretty slowly too, close to a lazy helicopter speed. the lights and the fact that it made no sound at all struck me as very odd. my house faces south, and i was looking southeast when i saw it. i tracked it visually until it was blocked by neighboring houses and trees. it seemed to be heading north. i don't know what it was, it flew like i would have expected a normal aircraft to fly (no crazy speed or turns) but the lights on it were very wrong. was it trying to look like normal aircraft traffic that goes over this area a lot? i have been taking my camera out to smoke with me and actually had it with me at the time, but i couldn't convince myself that i was looking at anything other than a wierd airplane (because of the familiar light pattern). i won't make that mistake again! i have seen multiple odd things in this area, mostly towards hilliard and dublin. everything i see is either heading directly into downtown columbus or heading north north-east towards powell. in the last two months i have seen an orange ball flying west to east directly towards downtown and a silver shiny disk flying west to east out of the city towards hilliard.
content.summary: Observed slow moving ufo with pulsing lights moving at tree line

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside at approximately 10 pm on 26 april 2012.I first noticed the light coming from the west and traveling to the east. i had my wife look at it and she immediately told me to bet my binoculars, which i did. through the binoculars the light appeared to have an oblong or oval shape. it did not blink. i handed the binoculars to my wife and continued to observe the light. it started moving to the south and as i observed it near some stars it gradually became smaller and "blinked out". there was no jet engine noise associated with this object. i've seen the space station at night and it has always traveled to the north at a higher rate of speed. in relation to aircraft that frequent our skies here, i would say that this was about 25,000 to 30,000 feet high. i've observed satellites many times and this was not like any i've seen.
content.summary: My wife and i observed a bright, unblinking light traveling west to east then it veered south and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I, "savi shankar", went out with a friend, "rocketman", to his 1979 rv pleasantly located near rocky branch marina in northwest arkansas.  "rocketman" has a friend taking care of the land and the rv, we'll call "porterhouse". the weather was nice and with such we will often spend saturday out at the rv, full of fishing, friends, and a good campfire. without much ado, i was looking up at the stars, just kinda staring and noticing how much easier it was to see them now that the city was further away.  looking straight up,i noticed a star slightly brighter than the other three that were around it (i will look up the constellation in a bit).  this "brighter star" then went out!  from outside in, it got dark. just as it went out another "brighter than the other stars" came on!  it was located about where one would say the the other corner of a triangle would be. to be more descriptive, the nose or front of the triangle was pointed south, the tail to the north.  the eastern corner light went out first, then the western tail light came on. the object was parallel or flat with the ground and these lights were on the bottom of the object. that light came on for about four seconds.  i laughed, and said out loud, "hahaaa, you guys screwed up, i saw you change your lights."  i thought to myself that if it was the military or perhaps some other foreign entity that surely they could hear me and that i should make fun of them. this seemed perfectly rational and humorous to me at the time (not really giving any credence to their actually being anything over my head.)  the object immediately turned off that light and with a very powerful yet powerfully muffled or silenced "wahooom", the object shot off to the south... i could see a black jet trail against the black sky, like a darker shadow on top of the dark sky... the trail was only four or five times the length of the object and quickly dissipated.  it reminded me of looking at the sun briefly then closing your eyes and you can still see that burn mark or tracer...Except this was black on black.  anyway, none of this would be known to anyone other than me if...Just a few hours ago, "rocketman" and myself just got back from the rv, friday april 27. "porterhouse" said, that thursday april 26 at approximately 12:00am, he woke up standing, naked, about 65 feet from the rv in a field, looking up and thinking to himself how did i get down.  there had been no drinking or other intoxication.  he says he feels like it was supposed to be a dream, like he was not supposed to worry about why he woke up there...  i can only say that what i saw, i feel was real.  i did not share what i saw with anyone until after i heard "porterhouse's" story.  the three of us jokingly figure it must be military espionage or manchurian candidate type implant because "porterhouse" has recently been employed by a senator from another state whom owns rental properties in the area.  "porterhouse" says he does not notice anything different but does feel really weird about his memory not working appropriately for that one evening. also, as an aside,he witnessed a bright white hypersonic craft while in the military, out at sea..He refused to sign the report of the incident for fear of losing his career, there were other witnesses to that incident.  this is my first report, and, the first thing i've seen.  what i saw really was right out of the x-files, and i'm gonna be really pissed if "porterhouse" ends up pregnant!!!  after we get done laughing of course.
content.summary: Saw a star turn off, then a star turn on about where the starboard aft tip would be on a triangle if the other star had been portside,then...

content.detailedDescription: around 11:30 pm eastern standard time new albany indiana.  we witnessed a single brite beam of light coming from one side of the moon.  the tree line blocked the other direction so i am not sure if it went out the other side.  as we looked up again around 12:30 to discuss the beam of light, again, it was gone.  we looked up from 11:30 pm for about 10 to 20 minutes every few minutes to look again.  we stooped paying attention after the 10 to 20 minutes, figured the moon does this at times and maybe we just never noticed.  we looked up again around 12:30 and the beam was gone.  again at around 12:45, looking up to see if it had returned, we noticed something flying very fast.  it,s lights blinking much faster than an airplane.  my neighbor said he thinks it was a helicopter.  as i was disputing his explanation, now everyone is looking, a very bright light  from nowhere, moved what seemed and arms length in distance, relatively speaking, the object was far away, than it disappeared as fast as it appeared.  now sure what to make of 3 strange events in one night within about an hours time.
content.summary: Beam of light from moon than what we guess was helicopter than what we guessed was  something we could not explain but very bright and fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the sun,i felt something in the air cant explain. when i looked at photos i saw orbs many of them and even a cylinder shape surrounding the sun. i also notice the sun was surrounded by pinkish red petals of light like flower petals. i took some videos too & saw this disc darting to and from towards the sun with a trail of light always behind it. the center was bright blue & outer edges were violet purple, i thought it may be a lens flare from my camera but i was using my cell phone which is 8 megapixels so i don't know if that would happen, in a few pics the orbs varied from bright white to transparent & there were many of them at same time.

i just felt a sense of a presence in the sky around me.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Disc shaped purple sphere of light on outer side neon blue circle in center yellow orange to gold emission

content.detailedDescription: An object, white no blinking lights was moving from north to south at an unknown altitude (probably 20000 ft) moved in a strait line then faded from sight in a clearly marked leaving the earths atmosphere pattern. this was a clear case of a vehicle leaving the planet, it was in the area of sky dominated by the orion constellation. as i reiterate it was plain that this object was definitely leaving the planets atmosphere. there was an  airplane in the vicinity but i don't think it was connected in any way since that plane was probably at about 8-10 thousand feet
content.summary: This was a direct path ufo that obviousy left the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I did not take this photo but it was passed along to me by my father who's coworker took the photo while observing the space shuttle enterprise flying over new york city.  from what i was told the object was not noticed while observing and it wasn't discovered until the photo was uploaded onto the computer.
content.summary: Shuttle enterprise & ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home headed east on hwy 25 lakeland drive just outside of jackson ms.  suburban area noticed above stop lights ahead some lights well above the horizon that at first glance looked like burst of lights... perhaps fireworks (color of bottle rocket fire).  then noticed looking ahead and above that the lights were more of of "orb like" but glowing almost like a candlelight color.  they did not blink, they didn't flash... just glowed.  they were in a slight loosely shaped v-formation as they crossed the highway... but as we moved down highway they seemed to change positions with each other.  i asked my father (in vehicle with me) if they were maybe a large number  (appx 20 or more that spanned across the highway and extended out on each end) of helicopters??  didnt seem to move fast enough for planes... but he's a retired faa  radar technician and said no... not plane or helicopters... he would know this  i'm sure after 35+ years at jan airport.    we were within a few miles of the airport, so i assumed it was some training exercise at first.    as we moved down highway slowly,  a few cars slowed down to look but no one stopped (busy road)  we thought the lights were moving slowly but we rushed to get home and see if they were visible on our farm in the night sky, and they were disappearing so fast we had to pull over on side of road to watch them disappear into the night sky.  they all seemed to "float" off but rather quickly.... then one last light trailed behind and then was gone.   visible for about 5 minutes.   if i could describe a reasonable explanation,  they looked like very large glowing balloons that were in some weird purposeful formation  (perhaps like light glow you would see on large hot air balloons) that changed positions with each other as they continued on their path.   but seemed to leave view just too quickly when we pulled over to watch them leave.   too fast for balloons,,, but not supersonic etc... too slow for planes....

dad said he's never seen anything like it... he's 75, retired navy radar technician and as i stated, retired faa airport radar tech.  has spent many hours in the tower too.

if interested,  i can draw the formation and colors of light
content.summary: Multiple glowing amber lights in slight formation crossing highway headed in one direction.. changing positions to each other disappearing floating off  into horizon in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were lying on lawn chairs star gazing.
2. the object was slowing moving in a north west direction directly over us.
3. when i first noticed it i pointed it out and we both could not figure out what it was.
4. the object was moving without sound or lights; it appeared to have a shimmer look to it, as if it was under water. it was a large v shape, like a block letter v and it moved in the direction of it's point. it was very big.
5. this was a bit scary but exciting to see something so strange.   
6. we lost sight of the object because it traveled out of sight range.

we could not believe what we saw; the shape was very dark and this thing was big enough to block out stars. it had  definite sharp edges to it. i never thought i would see something like this in town.
content.summary: Block letter v shape

content.detailedDescription: I went outside with dogs and noticed 2 stars in western sky that looked unusual in that i did not recognize their constellations.  they were near horizontal at 10:45 to 10:55 when i was watching.  i now believe them to have been procyon and betelguese.  i am near d.C. with a lot of background light and did not see the rest of orion.  i saw a very faint star-like light moving in between these 2 stars and flitting around, up, down, in small circles and then climbed up and then came down very fast.  saw it move in an arc downward very fast.  the moon was a crescent 45 degrees downward from these 2 stars and further to left were the 3 brightest stars of auriga in a "triangulum" pattern, if you will.  i believe it was flittering around like the recent mufon sighting over the tidal basin in d.C. and the joshua tree sighting a few weeks ago and the video from valentine's day.  the moon's light caught it nicely as it arced rapidly downward toward the south, and then i did not see it again.
content.summary: Faint star-like light moving around 2 stars in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter came over after work and said, you got to see this....
i stepped out onto my porch and to my left as if almost in between looking in the direction of johnson city, tn and elizabethon, tn. there was 4 white, hazy lights (approx size--size of each light a grapefruit). the 4 lights as if starting from a center point (disappear for an instant) then geometrically expand out in 4 separate directions without leaving a trail of light or beam of light as if a square of 4 lights in each corner on full expansion (approx full expansion a beach ball) then all 4 lights would go back into center point and disappear for an instant and then repeat the same pattern.
now i know what a lighthouse light will do and usually there is a start point from the ground with a beam of light projecting and circling. i did not see a source of light as if coming from the ground. the lights described above was well above the tree line and horizon.
content.summary: Four white , hazy (cloudy outside) lights doing a geometrical dance in the sky......

content.detailedDescription:
Henson creek trail ufo video #2 (alien probe) 

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
    
    henson creek trail

2. what made you first notice the object?

     always have observed this object in the sky.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

     it appeared to be a star.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

     appear to be stationary but after close examination will appear to move back and forth.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

     wonderful to observe.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

     never lost sight of the object.  it is not a helicopter, airplane, or any other type of human vehicle.
content.summary: Henson creek trail ufo video #2 (alien probe)
